name: A New Friends Club
briefDescription: ANFC founded in July, 2000, is a volunteering movement that inspires youth to volunteer and provides them with meaningful opportunities to serve the community.The goal of ANFC is to support school, destitute shelters, government hospitals and other organization in the social sector through volunteers who can help them mitigate some of their shortcoming and challenges. Volunteering is made easy and customized to individual's interests, time availability and skill sets.
